7// WindowSurfaceCGL.cpp: CGL implementation of egl::Surface for windows
8
9#include "common/platform.h"
10
11#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_MACOS) || defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_MACCATALYST)
12
13# include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/cgl/WindowSurfaceCGL.h"
14
15# import <Cocoa/Cocoa.h>
16# include <OpenGL/OpenGL.h>
17# import <QuartzCore/QuartzCore.h>
18
19# include "common/debug.h"
20# include "common/gl/cgl/FunctionsCGL.h"
21# include "libANGLE/Context.h"
22# include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/FramebufferGL.h"
23# include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/RendererGL.h"
24# include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/StateManagerGL.h"
25# include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/cgl/DisplayCGL.h"
26
27@interface WebSwapLayerCGL : CAOpenGLLayer {
28 CGLContextObj mDisplayContext;
29
30 bool initialized;
31 rx::SharedSwapState *mSwapState;
32 const rx::FunctionsGL *mFunctions;
33
34 GLuint mReadFramebuffer;
35}
36- (id)initWithSharedState:(rx::SharedSwapState *)swapState
37 withContext:(CGLContextObj)displayContext
38 withFunctions:(const rx::FunctionsGL *)functions;
39@end
40
41@implementation WebSwapLayerCGL
42- (id)initWithSharedState:(rx::SharedSwapState *)swapState
43 withContext:(CGLContextObj)displayContext
44 withFunctions:(const rx::FunctionsGL *)functions
45{
46 self = [super init];
47 if (self != nil)
48 {
49 self.asynchronous = YES;
50 mDisplayContext = displayContext;
51
52 initialized = false;
53 mSwapState = swapState;
54 mFunctions = functions;
55
56 [self setFrame:CGRectMake(0, 0, mSwapState->textures[0].width,
57 mSwapState->textures[0].height)];
58 }
59 return self;
60}
61
62- (CGLPixelFormatObj)copyCGLPixelFormatForDisplayMask:(uint32_t)mask
63{
64 CGLPixelFormatAttribute attribs[] = {
65 kCGLPFADisplayMask, static_cast<CGLPixelFormatAttribute>(mask), kCGLPFAOpenGLProfile,
66 static_cast<CGLPixelFormatAttribute>(kCGLOGLPVersion_3_2_Core),
67 static_cast<CGLPixelFormatAttribute>(0)};
68
69 CGLPixelFormatObj pixelFormat = nullptr;
70 GLint numFormats = 0;
71 CGLChoosePixelFormat(attribs, &pixelFormat, &numFormats);
72
73 return pixelFormat;
74}
75
76- (CGLContextObj)copyCGLContextForPixelFormat:(CGLPixelFormatObj)pixelFormat
77{
78 CGLContextObj context = nullptr;
79 CGLCreateContext(pixelFormat, mDisplayContext, &context);
80 return context;
81}
82
83- (BOOL)canDrawInCGLContext:(CGLContextObj)glContext
84 pixelFormat:(CGLPixelFormatObj)pixelFormat
85 forLayerTime:(CFTimeInterval)timeInterval
86 displayTime:(const CVTimeStamp *)timeStamp
87{
88 BOOL result = NO;
89
90 pthread_mutex_lock(&mSwapState->mutex);
91 {
92 if (mSwapState->lastRendered->swapId > mSwapState->beingPresented->swapId)
93 {
94 std::swap(mSwapState->lastRendered, mSwapState->beingPresented);
95 result = YES;
96 }
97 }
98 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mSwapState->mutex);
99
100 return result;
101}
102
103- (void)drawInCGLContext:(CGLContextObj)glContext
104 pixelFormat:(CGLPixelFormatObj)pixelFormat
105 forLayerTime:(CFTimeInterval)timeInterval
106 displayTime:(const CVTimeStamp *)timeStamp
107{
108 CGLSetCurrentContext(glContext);
109 if (!initialized)
110 {
111 initialized = true;
112
113 mFunctions->genFramebuffers(1, &mReadFramebuffer);
114 }
115
116 const auto &texture = *mSwapState->beingPresented;
117 if ([self frame].size.width != texture.width || [self frame].size.height != texture.height)
118 {
119 [self setFrame:CGRectMake(0, 0, texture.width, texture.height)];
120
121 // Without this, the OSX compositor / window system doesn't see the resize.
122 [self setNeedsDisplay];
123 }
124
125 // TODO(cwallez) support 2.1 contexts too that don't have blitFramebuffer nor the
126 // GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING query
127 GLint drawFBO;
128 mFunctions->getIntegerv(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, &drawFBO);
129
130 mFunctions->bindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, mReadFramebuffer);
131 mFunctions->framebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
132 texture.texture, 0);
133
134 mFunctions->bindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, mReadFramebuffer);
135 mFunctions->bindFramebuffer(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, drawFBO);
136 mFunctions->blitFramebuffer(0, 0, texture.width, texture.height, 0, 0, texture.width,
137 texture.height, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_NEAREST);
138
139 // Call the super method to flush the context
140 [super drawInCGLContext:glContext
141 pixelFormat:pixelFormat
142 forLayerTime:timeInterval
143 displayTime:timeStamp];
144}
145@end
146
147namespace rx
148{
149
150WindowSurfaceCGL::WindowSurfaceCGL(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
151 RendererGL *renderer,
152 EGLNativeWindowType layer,
153 CGLContextObj context)
154 : SurfaceGL(state),
155 mSwapLayer(nil),
156 mCurrentSwapId(0),
157 mLayer((__bridge CALayer *)layer),
158 mContext(context),
159 mFunctions(renderer->getFunctions()),
160 mStateManager(renderer->getStateManager()),
161 mDSRenderbuffer(0)
162{
163 pthread_mutex_init(&mSwapState.mutex, nullptr);
164}
165
166WindowSurfaceCGL::~WindowSurfaceCGL()
167{
168 EnsureCGLContextIsCurrent ensureContextCurrent(mContext);
169
170 pthread_mutex_destroy(&mSwapState.mutex);
171
172 if (mDSRenderbuffer != 0)
173 {
174 mStateManager->deleteRenderbuffer(mDSRenderbuffer);
175 mDSRenderbuffer = 0;
176 }
177
178 if (mSwapLayer != nil)
179 {
180 [mSwapLayer removeFromSuperlayer];
181 [mSwapLayer release];
182 mSwapLayer = nil;
183 }
184
185 for (size_t i = 0; i < ArraySize(mSwapState.textures); ++i)
186 {
187 if (mSwapState.textures[i].texture != 0)
188 {
189 mStateManager->deleteTexture(mSwapState.textures[i].texture);
190 mSwapState.textures[i].texture = 0;
191 }
192 }
193}
194
195egl::Error WindowSurfaceCGL::initialize(const egl::Display *display)
196{
197 EnsureCGLContextIsCurrent ensureContextCurrent(mContext);
198
199 unsigned width = getWidth();
200 unsigned height = getHeight();
201
202 for (size_t i = 0; i < ArraySize(mSwapState.textures); ++i)
203 {
204 mFunctions->genTextures(1, &mSwapState.textures[i].texture);
205 mStateManager->bindTexture(gl::TextureType::_2D, mSwapState.textures[i].texture);
206 mFunctions->texImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, width, height, 0, GL_RGBA,
207 GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr);
208 mSwapState.textures[i].width = width;
209 mSwapState.textures[i].height = height;
210 mSwapState.textures[i].swapId = 0;
211 }
212 mSwapState.beingRendered = &mSwapState.textures[0];
213 mSwapState.lastRendered = &mSwapState.textures[1];
214 mSwapState.beingPresented = &mSwapState.textures[2];
215
216 mSwapLayer = [[WebSwapLayerCGL alloc] initWithSharedState:&mSwapState
217 withContext:mContext
218 withFunctions:mFunctions];
219 [mLayer addSublayer:mSwapLayer];
220 [mSwapLayer setContentsScale:[mLayer contentsScale]];
221
222 mFunctions->genRenderbuffers(1, &mDSRenderbuffer);
223 mStateManager->bindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, mDSRenderbuffer);
224 mFunctions->renderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH24_STENCIL8, width, height);
225
226 return egl::Error(EGL_SUCCESS);
227}
228
229egl::Error WindowSurfaceCGL::makeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
230{
231 return egl::Error(EGL_SUCCESS);
232}
233
234egl::Error WindowSurfaceCGL::swap(const gl::Context *context)
235{
236 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
237 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
238
239 functions->flush();
240 mSwapState.beingRendered->swapId = ++mCurrentSwapId;
241
242 pthread_mutex_lock(&mSwapState.mutex);
243 {
244 std::swap(mSwapState.beingRendered, mSwapState.lastRendered);
245 }
246 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mSwapState.mutex);
247
248 unsigned width = getWidth();
249 unsigned height = getHeight();
250 auto &texture = *mSwapState.beingRendered;
251
252 if (texture.width != width || texture.height != height)
253 {
254 stateManager->bindTexture(gl::TextureType::_2D, texture.texture);
255 functions->texImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, width, height, 0, GL_RGBA,
256 GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr);
257
258 stateManager->bindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, mDSRenderbuffer);
259 functions->renderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH24_STENCIL8, width, height);
260
261 texture.width = width;
262 texture.height = height;
263 }
264
265 FramebufferGL *framebufferGL = GetImplAs<FramebufferGL>(context->getFramebuffer({0}));
266 stateManager->bindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, framebufferGL->getFramebufferID());
267 functions->framebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
268 mSwapState.beingRendered->texture, 0);
269
270 return egl::Error(EGL_SUCCESS);
271}
272
273egl::Error WindowSurfaceCGL::postSubBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
274 EGLint x,
275 EGLint y,
276 EGLint width,
277 EGLint height)
278{
279 UNIMPLEMENTED();
280 return egl::Error(EGL_SUCCESS);
281}

285 UNIMPLEMENTED();

287}

299 UNIMPLEMENTED();

301}
302
303void WindowSurfaceCGL::setSwapInterval(EGLint interval)
304{
305 // TODO(cwallez) investigate implementing swap intervals other than 0
306}
307
308EGLint WindowSurfaceCGL::getWidth() const
309{
310 return static_cast<EGLint>(CGRectGetWidth([mLayer frame]) * [mLayer contentsScale]);
311}
312
313EGLint WindowSurfaceCGL::getHeight() const
314{
315 return static_cast<EGLint>(CGRectGetHeight([mLayer frame]) * [mLayer contentsScale]);
316}
317
318EGLint WindowSurfaceCGL::isPostSubBufferSupported() const
319{
320 UNIMPLEMENTED();
321 return EGL_FALSE;
322}
323
324EGLint WindowSurfaceCGL::getSwapBehavior() const
325{
326 return EGL_BUFFER_DESTROYED;
327}
328
329FramebufferImpl *WindowSurfaceCGL::createDefaultFramebuffer(const gl::Context *context,
330 const gl::FramebufferState &state)
331{
332 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
333 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
334
335 GLuint framebuffer = 0;
336 functions->genFramebuffers(1, &framebuffer);
337 stateManager->bindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, framebuffer);
338 functions->framebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
339 mSwapState.beingRendered->texture, 0);
340 functions->framebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT, GL_RENDERBUFFER,
341 mDSRenderbuffer);
342
343 return new FramebufferGL(state, framebuffer, true, false);
344}
